name: Delisa Mulkey
bio: Delisa Mulkey was born and raised in Georgia and earned her PhD from Georgia State University. She is the author of the chapbook Peacock by Moonlight (1999), and her poems have appeared in such journals as BOMB, Painted Bride Quarterly, Nimrod, and Poetry, among others. She is the recipient of a Ruth Lilly Fellowship and a Writers Exchange prize from Poets & Writers.
